titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Select Committee on Intelligence.

calendar.text: Committee on Intelligence ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Intelligence. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator DeConcini. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S.RES. 71 ordered to be reported.

bill.summary: 1/28/1993--Introduced. Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Select Committee on Intelligence for the 103d Congress.
